---
title: "Contact"
---

<h1>Contact {{< fa feather-pointed >}}</h1>

<form action="https://formspree.io/f/xgvnoyva" method="POST">
  
  <div style="margin-bottom: 1em;">
    <label for="full-name" style="display: block; margin-bottom: 0.5em;">Full Name</label>
    <input type="text" id="full-name" name="name" required style="width: 100%; padding: 0.5em;">
  </div>

  <div style="margin-bottom: 1em;">
    <label for="email-address" style="display: block; margin-bottom: 0.5em;">Email Address</label>
    <input type="email" id="email-address" name="_replyto" required style="width: 100%; padding: 0.5em;">
  </div>

  <div style="margin-bottom: 1.5em;">
    <label for="message" style="display: block; margin-bottom: 0.5em;">Message</label>
    <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="6" required style="width: 100%; padding: 0.5em;"></textarea>
  </div>

  <button type="submit">Send Message</button>

</form>
